text: Hige'na nagra Jeremaia'na amanage hu'noe. Ra Anumzamoka nagrite'ma fore'ma nehia knazana, ko kenka antahinka hu'nane. Kasunku hunenantenka nazeri havizama nehaza vahera nona huzamanto. Na'ankure nagra Kagri eri'za vahe mani'noa zanku hu'za, nahe fri'za nehazanki antahi nenaminka kegava hunanto.
